anya-e0805n3:2_0: So ca saññāvasena chabbidho abyayībhāvo kammadhārayo digu tappuriso bahubbīhi dvando cāti.
anya-e0805n3:9_1: nipātapubbako ca nāmiko yuttattho teheva attapubbakehi upasagganipātehi saha niccaṁ samasīyate,
anya-e0805n3:9_3: Idha abyayībhāvādisaññāvidhāyakasuttāneva vā saññāvidhānamukhena samāsavidhāyakānīti daṭṭhabbāni.
anya-e0805n3:12_0: Tesaṁ nāmānaṁ payujjamānapadatthānaṁ yo yuttattho, so samāsasañño hoti, tadaññaṁ vākyamiti ruḷhaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:13_0: Nāmāni syādivibhatyantāni, samassateti samāso, saṅkhipiyatīti attho.
anya-e0805n3:18_2: sambandho vā attho yassa soyaṁ yuttattho,
anya-e0805n3:18_3: etena saṅgatatthena yuttatthavacanena bhinnatthānaṁ ekatthībhāvo samāsalakkhaṇanti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n3:18_4: Ettha ca ‘‘nāmāna’’nti vacanena ‘‘devadatto pacatī’’tiādīsu ākhyātena samāso na hotīti dasseti.
anya-e0805n3:18_5: Sambandhatthena pana yuttatthaggahaṇena ‘‘bhaṭo rañño putto devadattassā’’tiādīsu aññamaññānapekkhesu,
anya-e0805n3:18_6: ‘‘devadattassa kaṇhā dantā’’tiādīsu ca aññasāpekkhesu ayuttatthatāya samāso na hotīti dīpeti.
anya-e0805n3:21_0: Idha padantarena vā taddhitappaccayehi vā āyādippaccayehi vā ekatthībhūtā yuttatthā nāma,
anya-e0805n3:21_3: Samāsaggahaṇādhikāre pana sati tesaṁgahaṇena vā taddhitāyādippaccayanta vibhattilopo.
anya-e0805n3:24_0: Luttāsu vibhattīsu sarantassa assa yuttatthabhūtassa tividhassapi liṅgassa pakatibhāvo hoti.
anya-e0805n3:25_0: Sakatthavirahenidha samāsassa ca liṅgabhāvābhāvā vibhattuppattiyamasampattāyaṁ nāmabyapadesātidesamāha.
anya-e0805n3:27_1: samāsā ca nāmamiva daṭṭhabbā tavetuna tvāna tvādippaccayante vajjetvā.
anya-e0805n3:27_3: Idha samāsaggahaṇaṁ atthavataṁ samudāyānaṁ nāmabyapadeso samāsassevāti niyamatthanti apare.
anya-e0805n3:30_1: Ettha hi satipi liṅgātidese ‘‘adhipañña’’ntiādīsu ‘‘adhiñāṇaṁ’’ntiādi rūpappasaṅgo na hoti saddantarattā,
anya-e0805n3:33_0: Tasmā akārantā abyayībhāvā parāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ kvaci aṁ hoti, sesaṁ neyyaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:41_0: Vicchāyaṁ – attānamattānaṁ pati paccattaṁ, addhamāsaṁ addhamāsaṁ anu anvaddhamāsaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:43_0: Paṭilome – sotassa paṭilomaṁ paṭisotaṁ, paṭipathaṁ, pativātaṁ, attānaṁ adhikicca pavattā ajjhattaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:45_0: Samiddhiyaṁ – bhikkhāya samiddhīti atthe samāseva napuṁsakaliṅgatte ca kate –
anya-e0805n3:48_0: Napuṁsake vattamānassa samāsassa anto saro rasso hoti.
anya-e0805n3:48_2: tena digudvandabahubbīhīsupi napuṁsake vattamānassa samāsantassarassa rassattaṁ siddhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n3:52_0: Akārantato aññasmā abyayībhāvasamāsā parāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ lopo ca hoti. Adhitti,
anya-e0805n3:58_0: So ca navavidho visesanapubbapado visesanuttarapado visesanobhayapado upamānuttarapado sambhāvanāpubbapado
anya-e0805n3:59_3: mahanto ca so puriso cāti viggahe –
anya-e0805n3:60_0: Ito paraṁ ‘‘vibhāsā rukkhatiṇa’’iccādito ‘‘vibhāsā’’ti samāsavidhāne sabbattha vattate.
anya-e0805n3:62_0: Dve padāni nāmikāni tulyādhikaraṇāni aññamaññena saha vibhāsā samasyante,
anya-e0805n3:62_1: tasmiṁ dvipade tulyādhikaraṇe sati so samāso kammadhārayasañño ca hoti.
anya-e0805n3:63_1: tulyaṁ samānaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ attho yassa padadvayassa taṁ tulyādhikaraṇaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:63_3: Bhinnappavattinimittānaṁ dvinnaṁ padānaṁ visesanavisesitabbabhāvena ekasmiṁ atthe pavatti tulyādhikaraṇatā.
anya-e0805n3:63_5: Yathā hi kammaṁ kriyañca payojanañca dvayaṁ dhārayati,
anya-e0805n3:63_8: tathā ayaṁ samāso ekassa atthassa dve nāmāni dhārayati,
anya-e0805n3:63_9: tasmiṁ samāse sati ekatthajotakassa nāmadvayassa sambhavato.
anya-e0805n3:66_0: Mahanta saddassa mahā hoti tulyādhikaraṇe uttarapade pare.
anya-e0805n3:66_2: ettha ca visesanassa pubbanipāto visesanabhūtassa pubbapadassa mahādesavidhānatova viññāyati.
anya-e0805n3:70_1: tappurisasadisattā ayampi samāso anvatthasaññāya tappurisoti vutto.
anya-e0805n3:71_6: Santo ca so puriso cāti sappuriso,
anya-e0805n3:71_7: ‘‘santasaddassa so bhe bo cante’’ti ettha casaddena santasaddassa samāse abhakārepi sādeso,
anya-e0805n3:72_0: Kvaci vibhāsādhikārato na bhavati, yathā – puṇṇo mantāniputto, citto gahapati, sakko devarājāti.
anya-e0805n3:73_0: Pumā ca so kokilo cāti atthe samāse kate –
anya-e0805n3:76_0: Pumaiccetassa anto akāro lopamāpajjate liṅgādīsu parapadesu samāsesu,
anya-e0805n3:77_0: Khattiyā ca sā kaññā cāti viggayha samāse kate –
anya-e0805n3:78_0: ‘‘Tulyādhikaraṇe, pade, itthiyaṁ bhāsitapumitthī pumāva ce’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n3:80_0: Kammadhārayasaññe ca samāse itthiyaṁ vattamāne tulyādhikaraṇe uttarapade pare pubbabhūto itthivācako saddo pubbe bhāsitapumā ce,
anya-e0805n3:80_1: so pumā iva daṭṭhabboti pubbapade itthippaccayassa nivatti hoti.
anya-e0805n3:81_4: brāhmaṇī ca sā dārikā cāti brāhmaṇadārikā,
anya-e0805n3:82_1: tena ‘‘khattiyakumārī kumārasamaṇī taruṇabrāhmaṇī’’tiādīsu uttarapadesu itthippaccayassa na nivatti hoti.
anya-e0805n3:85_0: Tathā puratthimo ca so kāyo cāti puratthimakāyo,
anya-e0805n3:86_0: Visesanuttarapade jinavacanānuparodhato therācariyapaṇḍitādi visesanaṁ parañca bhavati. Yathā –
anya-e0805n3:86_1: sāriputto ca so thero cāti sāriputtatthero.
anya-e0805n3:86_7: mahosadho ca so paṇḍito cāti mahosadhapaṇḍito.
anya-e0805n3:87_2: siniddho ca so uṇho cāti siniddhuṇho, māso.
anya-e0805n3:87_3: Khañjo ca so khujjo cāti khañjakhujjo.
anya-e0805n3:88_0: Upamānuttarapade abhidhānānurodhato upamānabhūtaṁ visesanaṁ paraṁ bhavati. Yathā –
anya-e0805n3:88_2: muni ca so sīho cāti munisīho.
anya-e0805n3:88_8: saddhammo ca so raṁsi cāti saddhammaraṁsi.
anya-e0805n3:88_11: samaṇo ca so puṇḍarīko cāti samaṇapuṇḍarīko,
anya-e0805n3:91_0: Nanipātapubbapado yathā – na brāhmaṇoti atthe kammadhārayasamāse, vibhattilopādimhi ca kate –
anya-e0805n3:94_0: Nassa nipātapadassa tappurise uttarapade pare sabbasseva attaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n3:102_0: Tattha yo ‘‘asūriyapassā rājadārā’’tiādīsu viya uttarapadatthassa sabbathā abhāvaṁ dīpeti,
anya-e0805n3:102_2: Yo pana ‘‘abrāhmaṇa amanussā’’tiādīsu viya uttarapadatthaṁ pariyudāsitvā taṁsadise vatthumhi kāriyaṁ paṭipādayati,
anya-e0805n3:107_4: yadā te pana aññena sadisādivācakena naiti nipātena yujjanti,
anya-e0805n3:107_7: tasmā uttarapadatthajotakoyevettha naiti nipātoti na doso,
anya-e0805n3:108_0: Aññatthe – na byākatā abyākatā, asaṁkiliṭṭhā, apariyāpannā.
anya-e0805n3:109_0: Viruddhatthe – na kusalā akusalā, kusalapaṭipakkhāti attho. Evaṁ alobho, amitto.
anya-e0805n3:110_0: Pasajjappaṭisedhe – na katvā akatvā, akātuna puññaṁ akaronto.
anya-e0805n3:113_0: Naiccetassa padassa tappurise uttarapade ana hoti sare pare.
anya-e0805n3:115_0: Kupubbapado yathā – kucchitamannanti niccasamāsattā aññapadena viggaho, kammadhārayasamāse kate –
anya-e0805n3:118_0: Kuiccetassa nipātassa tappurise uttarapade kada hoti sare pare. Kadannaṁ. Evaṁ kadasanaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:119_0: Sareti kiṁ? Kudārā, kuputtā, kudāsā, kudiṭṭhi.
anya-e0805n3:122_0: Kuiccetassa appatthe vattamānassa kā hoti tappurise uttarapade pare.
anya-e0805n3:124_1: tesaṁ ‘‘nāmānaṁ samāso’’ti yogavibhāgena samāso daṭṭhabbo. Yathā –
anya-e0805n3:125_3: kammani diṭṭhā pubbanti diṭṭhapubbā devā tena.
anya-e0805n3:129_0: Tayo lokā samāhaṭā cittena sampiṇḍitā, tiṇṇaṁ lokānaṁ samāhāroti vā atthe –
anya-e0805n3:134_2: Atha vā saṅkhyāpubbattanapuṁsakekattasaṅkhātehi dvīhi lakkhaṇehi gato avagatoti digūti vuccati,
anya-e0805n3:134_3: dvīhi vā lakkhaṇehi gacchati pavattatīti digu.
anya-e0805n3:144_1: tena samāsantagatānaṁ rājādīnaṁ nāmānaṁ anto kvaci akāro hotīti attho.
anya-e0805n3:144_2: Kāraggahaṇena bahubbīhādimhi samāsante kvaci kappaccayo hoti,
anya-e0805n3:144_3: surabhi su du pūtīhi gandhantassikāro ca.
anya-e0805n3:145_0: Atha vā a ca ko ca akā,
anya-e0805n3:145_2: tena kvaci samāsantagatānamanto hutvā a ka iccete paccayā hontīti attho.
anya-e0805n3:145_3: Tena pañca gāvo samāhaṭāti atthe samāsādiṁ katvā samāsante appaccaye,
anya-e0805n3:145_4: ‘‘o sare cā’’ti avādese ca kate ‘‘pañcagava’’ntiādi ca sijjhati.
anya-e0805n3:146_1: eko ca so puggalo cāti ekapuggalo.
anya-e0805n3:150_0: So pana dutiyādīsu chasu vibhattīsu bhāvato chabbidho.
anya-e0805n3:154_0: Amādivibhatyantāni yuttatthāni pubbapadāni nāmehi parapadebhi saha vibhāsā samasyante,
anya-e0805n3:157_0: Upapadasamāse pana vuttiyeva tassa niccattā. Yathā –
anya-e0805n3:160_0: Tatiyā kitaka pubba sadisa samūnattha kalaha nipuṇa missasakhilādīhi.
anya-e0805n3:175_0: ‘‘Devānaṁ rājā’’ti atthe samāsādimhi kate ‘‘kvaci samāsantagatānamakāranto’’ti akāro,
anya-e0805n3:175_1: tato ‘‘syā cā’’ti āttaṁ na bhavati. Devarājo, devarājā,
anya-e0805n3:176_0: Pumassa liṅgaṁ pulliṅgaṁ. Evaṁ pumbhāvo, pumantalopādi.
anya-e0805n3:179_1: ‘‘Bhaṭo rañño puriso devadattassā’’ti ettha ‘‘bhaṭasambandhe chaṭṭhī’’ti aññamaññānapekkhatāya ayuttatthabhāvato samāso na bhavati,
anya-e0805n3:179_2: ‘‘kosalassa rañño putto’’tiādīsu pana sāpekkhatāya asamatthattā na bhavati,
anya-e0805n3:179_3: sambandhīsaddānaṁ pana niccaṁ sāpekkhattepi gamakattā samāso, yathā –
anya-e0805n3:181_23: itthīsu dhutto itthidhutto chāyāya sukkho chāyāsukkho,
anya-e0805n3:183_0: Idha na bhavati, bhojane mattaññutā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, āsane nisinno, āsane nisīditabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:185_0: ‘‘Tadanuparodhenā’’ti vuttattā yathābhidhānaṁ tappurise kvaci accantādīsu amādivibhatyantaṁ pubbapadaṁ paraṁ sambhavati.
anya-e0805n3:189_3: tato ‘‘tesaṁ vibhattiyo lopā cā’’ti vibhattilope sampatte tattheva caggahaṇena pubbapade vibhattilopābhāvo.
anya-e0805n3:194_3: sahapubbapado upamānapubbapado saṅkhyobhayapado disantarāḷattho byatihāralakkhaṇo cāti.
anya-e0805n3:195_0: Tattha dvipado tulyādhikaraṇo bahubbīhi kammādīsu chasu vibhatyatthesu bhavati.
anya-e0805n3:196_0: Tattha dutiyatthe tāva – ‘‘āgatā samaṇā imaṁ saṅghārāma’’nti viggahe –
anya-e0805n3:198_0: Samasyamānapadato aññesaṁ paṭhamadutiyādivibhatyantānaṁ padānamatthesu yuttatthāni nāmāni vibhāsā samasyante,
anya-e0805n3:200_1: tesu yattha visesanabhūto attho aññapadatthaggahaṇena gayhati,
anya-e0805n3:201_0: Yattha pana na gayhati, so atagguṇasaṁviññāṇo, yathā – bahudhanamānayāti.
anya-e0805n3:202_0: Idha bahubbīhisadde viya visesanassa pubbanipāto, sesaṁ pubbasamaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:203_2: samaṇasaddo ca attano atthe aṭṭhatvā dutiyāvibhatyatthabhūte saṅghārāmasaṅkhāte aññapadatthe vattanti,
anya-e0805n3:203_4: tato samāseneva kammatthassa abhihitattā puna dutiyā na hoti.
anya-e0805n3:204_2: paṭipannā addhikā yaṁ pathaṁ soyaṁ paṭipannaddhiko patho ,
anya-e0805n3:204_3: abhiruḷhā vāṇijā yaṁ nāvaṁ sā abhiruḷhavāṇijā nāvā.
anya-e0805n3:205_1: jitāni indriyāni yena samaṇena soyaṁ jitindriyo samaṇo.
anya-e0805n3:206_1: dinno suṅko yassa rañño soyaṁ dinnasuṅko rājā,
anya-e0805n3:206_2: upanītaṁ bhojanaṁ assa samaṇassāti upanītabhojano samaṇo,
anya-e0805n3:207_1: niggatā janā asmā gāmā soyaṁ niggatajano gāmo,
anya-e0805n3:208_1: chinnā hatthā yassa purisassa soyaṁ chinnahattho puriso.
anya-e0805n3:208_15: idha parimāṇasaddassa sannidhānato dasasaddo saṅkhyāne vattate,
anya-e0805n3:208_17: ko pabhavo assāti kiṁpabhavo ayaṁ kāyo,
anya-e0805n3:209_0: Chandajātādīsu visesanavisesitabbānaṁ yathicchitattā ubhayaṁ pubbaṁ nipatati, yathā –
anya-e0805n3:213_0: Itthiyaṁ vattamāne tulyādhikaraṇe pade pare pubbe bhāsitapumā itthivācako saddo atthi ce,
anya-e0805n3:213_1: so pumā iva daṭṭhabboti pubbapade itthippaccayābhāvo,
anya-e0805n3:215_0: Kvaci taddhitasamāsanāmopasaggādīsu padesu ādimajjhuttarabhūtānaṁ sarānaṁ jinavacanānuparodhena dīgharassā honti paccayesu,
anya-e0805n3:218_0: Rassattaṁ ajjave itthi- rūpādo ca ka, tādisūti.
anya-e0805n3:219_2: tathā pahūtā jivhā assāti pahūtajivho bhagavā.
anya-e0805n3:221_0: Pubbapadassevāyaṁ pumbhāvātideso, tena idha na bhavati. Bahudāsiko puriso. Bahukumārikaṁ kulaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:226_3: nānādumapatitāni ca tāni pupphāni cāti nānādumapatitapupphāni,
anya-e0805n3:226_5: nānādumapatitapupphavāsitā sānū yassa pabbatassa soyaṁ nānādumapatitapupphavāsitasānu pabbato.
anya-e0805n3:227_3: tādiso kūṭo yassa soyaṁ byālambambudharabinducumbitakūṭo iccādi.
anya-e0805n3:228_1: sampannāni sassāni yasmiṁ janapade soyaṁ sampannasasso janapado,
anya-e0805n3:228_3: Ākiṇṇā manussā yassaṁ rājadhāniyaṁ sā ākiṇṇamanussā rājadhānī,
anya-e0805n3:233_2: samānena janena saddhiṁ vāso assāti samānavāso puriso.
anya-e0805n3:234_1: parakkamenādhigatā sampadā yehi te bhavanti parakkamādhigatasampadā mahāpurisā.
anya-e0805n3:234_3: oṇīto pattato pāṇi yena soyaṁ oṇītapattapāṇi,
anya-e0805n3:234_4: sīhassa pubbaddhaṁ viya kāyo assāti sīhapubbaddhakāyo,
anya-e0805n3:234_5: mattā bahavo mātaṅgā asminti mattabahumātaṅgaṁ vanaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n3:235_2: Idha ‘‘attaṁ nassa tappurise’’ti sutte ‘‘attaṁ nassā’’ti yogavibhāgena nassa attaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:235_6: na vijjate vuṭṭhi etthāti avuṭṭhiko janapado,
anya-e0805n3:235_13: na vijjanti āsavā etesanti anāsavā iccādi.
anya-e0805n3:236_6: Evaṁ saha paccayehi vattantīti sappaccayā, sakileso,
anya-e0805n3:237_2: kāyabyāmānaṁ samappamāṇatāya nigrodho iva parimaṇḍalo yo rājakumāro soyaṁnigrodhaparimaṇḍalo rājakumāro.
anya-e0805n3:237_6: cakkhu iva bhūto ayaṁ paramatthadassanatoti cakkhubhūto bhagavā.
anya-e0805n3:237_10: andho viya bhūto ayanti andhabhūto bālo.
anya-e0805n3:238_1: suvaṇṇavaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassa soyaṁ suvaṇṇavaṇṇo bhagavā.
anya-e0805n3:238_8: sīhassa pubbaddhaṁ viya assa kāyoti sīhapubbaddhakāyo,
anya-e0805n3:238_9: brahmuno viya aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato saro assāti brahmassaro.
anya-e0805n3:239_1: dve vā tayo vā pattā dvattipattā,
anya-e0805n3:239_5: cha vā pañca vā vācā chappañcavācā.
anya-e0805n3:240_1: pubbassā ca dakkhiṇassā ca disāya yadantarāḷaṁ sāyaṁ pubbadakkhiṇā vidisā.
anya-e0805n3:240_7: Yadā pana dakkhiṇā ca sā pubbā cāti kammadhārayasamāso hoti,
anya-e0805n3:241_1: kesesu ca kesesu ca gahetvā idaṁ yuddhaṁ pavattatīti kesākesi,
anya-e0805n3:241_2: daṇḍehi ca daṇḍehi ca paharitvā idaṁ yuddhaṁ pavattatīti daṇḍādaṇḍi,
anya-e0805n3:251_1: so pana atthavasena kevalasamuccayo anvācayo itarītarayogo samāhāro cāti catubbidho.
anya-e0805n3:253_2: dvandasadisattā ayaṁ samāsopi anvatthasaññāya dvandoti vuccati,
anya-e0805n3:254_0: Nanu ca ubhayapadatthappadhānatte sati dvande kathamekatthībhāvo siyāti? Vuccate –
anya-e0805n3:254_1: sadisādiatthepi saddappavattisambhavenadvinnaṁ padānaṁ ekakkhaṇeyeva atthadvayadīpakattā na virodho,
anya-e0805n3:254_4: Yathā hi bhūsaddo anubhavaabhibhavādike atthe anvabhiādiupasaggasahitova dīpeti,
anya-e0805n3:254_9: Atha vā dvinnampi yathāvuttasamuccayadīpakattā atthi dvandepekatthitāti na koci virodho,
anya-e0805n3:260_0: Jāyāsaddassa tudaṁ jāniiccete ādesā honti patisadde pare kvaci.
anya-e0805n3:261_3: surā ca asurā ca garuḷā ca manujā ca bhujagā ca gandhabbā ca surāsuragaruḷamanujabhujagagandhabbā.
anya-e0805n3:264_1: ‘‘cakkhu ca sotañcā’’ti atthe ‘‘nāmānaṁ samuccayo dvando’’ti dvandasamāsaṁ katvā vibhattilopādimhi kate –
anya-e0805n3:266_0: 359.Tathā dvande pāṇi tūriya yogga senaṅga khuddajantuka vividha viruddha visabhāgatthādīnañca.
anya-e0805n3:267_1: tathā samāhāradvandasamāsepi pāṇi tūriya yogga senaṅgatthānaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:268_0: Pāṇino ca tūriyāni ca yoggāni ca senā cāti pāṇitūriya yoggasenā,
anya-e0805n3:268_3: Khuddā ca te jantukā ceti khuddajantukā,
anya-e0805n3:268_8: vividhā ca te lakkhaṇato sabhāgā ca kiccatoti visabhāgā.
anya-e0805n3:268_9: Pāṇitūriyayoggasenaṅgāni ca khuddajantukā ca vividhaviruddhā ca visabhāgā cāti dvando,
anya-e0805n3:269_0: Ādiggahaṇena aññoññaliṅgavisesita saṅkhyāparimāṇattha pacanacaṇḍālattha disatthādīnañca dvande ekattaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:269_3: napuṁsakaliṅgattañca katvā samāsattā nāmabyapadese kate syādyuppatti amādesādi.
anya-e0805n3:271_4: Saṅkhe ca paṇavo ca ḍiṇḍimo ca,
anya-e0805n3:271_5: saṅkhā ca paṇavā ca ḍaṁṇḍimā cāti vā saṅkhapaṇavaḍiṇḍimaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:272_0: Yoggaṅgatthe yathā – phālo ca pācanañca phālapācanaṁ, yugañca naṅgalañca yuganaṅgalaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:273_0: Senaṅgatthe hatthino ca assā ca hatthiassaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:274_0: Khuddajantukatthe ḍaṁsā ca makasā ca ḍaṁsamakasaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:275_1: ahī ca nakulā cāti vā ahinakulaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:276_10: ‘‘Aṁmo niggahītaṁ jhalapehī’’ti ettha ‘‘aṁmo’’ti niddesadassanato katthaci napuṁsakaliṅgattaṁ na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:277_0: Aññoññaliṅgavisesitānaṁ dvande dāsī ca dāso ca dāsidāsaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:279_0: Pacanacaṇḍālatthānaṁ dvande orabbhikā ca sūkarikā ca orabbhikasūkarikaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:280_0: Disatthānaṁ dvande pubbā ca aparā cāti atthe dvandasamāsaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:280_2: napuṁsakaliṅgatte ca kate ‘‘saro rasso napuṁsake’’ti rassattaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:282_0: 360.Vibhāsā rukkha tiṇa pasu dhana dhañña janapadādīnañca.
anya-e0805n3:283_0: Rukkha tiṇa pasu dhana dhañña janapadādīnamekattaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:284_0: Tattha rukkhānaṁ dvande assatthā ca kapitthā cāti atthe samāhāre dvandasamāsādimhi kate iminā vikappenekattaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:285_0: Tiṇānaṁ dvande usīrāni ca bīraṇāni ca usīrabīraṇaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:286_0: Pasūnaṁ dvande ajā ca eḷakā ca ajeḷakaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:286_2: hatthī ca gāvo ca assā ca vaḷavā ca hatthigavassavaḷavaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:288_0: Dhaññānaṁdvande sālī ca yavā ca sāliyavaṁ, sāliyavā vā. Evaṁ tilamuggamāsaṁ, tilamuggamāsā vā.
anya-e0805n3:289_0: Janapadānaṁ dvande kāsī ca kosalā ca kāsikosalaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:291_0: Sakuṇānaṁ dvande haṁsā ca bakā ca haṁsabakaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:300_0: Digu dudhā tappuriso, aṭṭhadhā navadhā bhave;
